channel.title: I need help starting ANY Client
channel.description:
When I try to start any client, say a PI client, it's not loading right. It wont even attempt to start. I've re-downloaded Java JDK and JRE multiple times and re-installed them. This is what I got...
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:30 1) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:247) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
This is starting to make me mad haha... Please help!

item.title: I need help starting ANY Client
item.dc:creator: @brazzwoodall brazzwoodall
item.description:
@brazzwoodall wrote:

I got it to work, but now it’s not even attempting to load up the client. It says:

“Could not find or load main class Gui”

Lol, this is crazyyy…

Read full topic
item.source: I need help starting ANY Client

item.title: I need help starting ANY Client
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

The client couldn’t locate the client.class file (Yes, this time it’s the one with the byte code inside of it).

http://www.codegravity.com/blog/noclassdeffounderror
Should explain it, and tell you how to fix it.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help starting ANY Client

item.title: I need help starting ANY Client
item.dc:creator: @Ags_Rush Ags Rush
item.description:
@Ags_Rush wrote:

You have a java error, check your Java version, then check your environment variable “Path”. It should say something like, c:/program files/java/jre6/ something like that, if not, look up a guide on how to change the correctly.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help starting ANY Client
